title: Care Economics
description: Test your understanding of care work economics and recognition

questions.question: Why is most care work 'invisible' in traditional economics?
questions.explanation: Care work often happens outside markets, making it invisible to GDP and traditional metrics.

questions.question: The Value Scanner aims to monetize all care work.
questions.explanation: The goal is recognition and valuation, not necessarily monetization of all care.

questions.question: What is REA in the context of value recognition?
questions.explanation: REA (Resource-Event-Agent) is a semantic accounting model for tracking value flows.
